name: Facebook Green
description:
This style uses style 3487 by user 4080 and other scripts designed for myspace to make facebook look nice and green. I love mint green colors and this theme works well with my setup and I am thinking allot of you will like it too.

HIGH QUALITY PREVIEW HERE ( http://rdrdreg.deviantart.com/art/Green-Facebook-67883302 )

Updates
22nd OCT 07 - More green text and profile application title bars are now green.

discussions.name: I really liked the way this was going, but Faceboo
